howToSignUp.q: How to sign up for training?
howToSignUp.a: Call us or fill out the form on the website. We will find a convenient time and gym for you.

trialSession.a: Yes, you can attend the first session for free to meet the coach and format.

equipment.q: Do I need my own equipment?
equipment.a: Rackets and shuttlecocks are provided by the club. You only need sports shoes and clothing.

cta.title: Ready to start training?
cta.subtitle: Sign up for a trial session today

values.professionalismDesc: High-quality training with certified coaches and modern equipment
values.friendlinessDesc: Welcoming environment for players of all ages and skill levels
values.resultsDesc: Individual approach to each student to achieve maximum progress

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet our professional coaches
team.founderDesc1: Alexei founded ALTIUS in 2010 with a vision to develop badminton in Moldova. His professional approach and dedication have helped hundreds of students achieve their goals.
team.founderDesc2: Under his leadership, the club has become one of the leading badminton training centers in Chisinau, known for its high-quality coaching and friendly atmosphere.
team.founderQuote: Every student is unique, and our goal is to help each person reach their maximum potential in badminton.
